summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 1 through 7 and 12 through 16, Block 1 and Lot 5, 6 and 7, Block 6, McArthur's Addition, with respect to Use and Area District, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-405 and 17-299, respectively.
